ApproxsimClient.map
Class GeoMath

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.map.GeoMath

public class GeoMath
extends Object

This class contains necessary measures and methods used in APPROXSIM map manipulations.

Method Detail

distanceGC

public static double distanceGC(double lat1,
                                double lon1,
                                double lat2,
                                double lon2)
Computes great circle distance between two points. The input parameters are assumed to be degrees.

Parameters:
lat1 - latitude of first point.
lon1 - longitude of first point.
lat2 - latitude of second point.
lon2 - longitude of second point.
Returns:
great circle distance between the points in meters.
